00029 PulseViewer::PulseViewer(modules::options* opts):

00041 int PulseViewer::BeforeFirstEntry(TGlobalData* gData, const TSetupData* setup){
00042    // Check we're also running with the ExportPulse module
00043    if(!ExportPulse::Instance()){
00044            cout<<"PulseViewer: Error: You need to run with ExportPulse to use PulseViewer module"<<std::endl;
00045            return 1;
00046    }
00047    
00048    // Check the channel is valid
00049    if(!fSource.Channel().isValid()){
00050            cout<<"PulseViewer: Error: No detector called '"<<fRequestedSource<<"' exists"<<endl;
00051            return 2;
00052    }
00053    
00054    // Parse the trigger string
00055    return ParseTriggerString(fTriggerCondition);
00056 }
00057 
00058 int PulseViewer::ParseTriggerString(const std::string& trigger_condition){
00059         // Look for something like 'amplitude > 3'
00060         size_t equality_start=trigger_condition.find_first_of("<>=");
00061         if(equality_start==std::string::npos) {
00062                 cout<<"Error: trigger '"<<trigger_condition<<"'' doesn't contain an equality (==,>,<,<=,>=)"<<endl;
00063                 return 1;
00064         }
00065         // Check the type of equality given
00066         int retVal=0;
00067         retVal=SetTriggerType(trigger_condition.substr(equality_start,2));
00068         if(retVal!=0) return retVal;
00069 
00070         // Check the parameter to compare
00071         retVal=SetTriggerParameter(GetOneWord(trigger_condition,0,equality_start));
00072         if(retVal!=0) return retVal;
00073 
00074         // Get the value to compare to
00075         retVal=SetTriggerValue(trigger_condition.substr(equality_start+fTypeString.size()));
00076         return retVal;
00077 }
00078 
00079 int PulseViewer::SetTriggerType(const std::string& equality){
00080         bool problem=false;
00081         if(equality[1]=='='){
00082                 switch(equality[0]){
00083                         case '<': fTriggerType=kLE; break;
00084                         case '>': fTriggerType=kGE; break;
00085                         case '=': fTriggerType=kE; break;
00086                         default:
00087                                   problem=true;
00088                 }
00089                 if(!problem)fTypeString=equality.substr(0,2);
00090         } else{
00091                 switch(equality[0]){
00092                         case '<': fTriggerType=kL; break;
00093                         case '>': fTriggerType=kG; break;
00094                         case '=': 
00095                         default:
00096                                   problem=true;
00097                 }
00098                 if(!problem)fTypeString=equality[0];
00099         }
00100         if(problem){
00101           cout<<"Error: Unknown equality-type passed to PulseViewer: '"<<equality<<"'"<<endl;
00102           return 2;
00103         }
00104         return 0;
00105 }
00106 
00107 int PulseViewer::SetTriggerParameter(const std::string& parameter){
00108   typedef std::map<std::string,ParameterType> ParameterKeys;
00109   static ParameterKeys available_params;
00110   if(available_params.empty()){
00111      available_params["amplitude"]=kAmplitude;
00112      available_params["time"]=kTime;
00113      available_params["TPI_length"]=kTPILength;
00114      available_params["integral"]=kIntegral;
00115      available_params["energy"]=kEnergy;
00116      available_params["pedestal"]=kPedestal;
00117      available_params["trigger_time"]=kTriggerTime;
00118   }
00119   ParameterKeys::iterator it=available_params.find(parameter);
00120         if(it!=available_params.end()){
00121     fTriggerParameter=it->second;
00122   }else{
00123                 cout<<"Error: Unknown parameter requested: '"<<parameter<<"'"<<endl;
00124                 cout<<"   Possible values are:"<<endl;
00125     for(it=available_params.begin();it!=available_params.end();it++){
00126                      cout<<"    |-"<<it->first<<endl;
00127     }
00128                 return 1;
00129         }
00130         fParameterString=parameter;
00131         return 0;
00132 }
00133 
00134 int PulseViewer::SetTriggerValue(const std::string& parameter){
00135         fTriggerValue=GetDouble(parameter);
00136         return 0;
00137 }

00139 int PulseViewer::ProcessEntry(TGlobalData* gData, const TSetupData* setup){
00140 
00141     // Get the TAPs for this channel
00142   AnalysedPulseList* allTAPs=&gAnalysedPulseMap[GetSource()];
00143 
00144     if(!allTAPs){
00145        cout<<"Problem getting TAP list for "<<GetSource()<<endl;
00146             return 1;
00147     }else if(allTAPs->empty() ){
00148        if(Debug()) cout<<"List of TAPS for '"<< GetSource()<<"' was empty "<<endl;
00149        return 0;
00150     }
00151 
00152     // Check each TAP against trigger
00153     int retVal=0;
00154     for(AnalysedPulseList::iterator i_pulse=allTAPs->begin();
00155                 i_pulse!=allTAPs->end() && retVal==0;
00156                 i_pulse++){
00157             retVal=ConsiderDrawing(i_pulse-allTAPs->begin() ,*i_pulse);
00158     }
00159     if(retVal!=0) return retVal;
00160 
00161   return 0;
00162 }

00164 double PulseViewer::GetParameterValue(const TAnalysedPulse& pulse){
00165         double retVal=0;
00166         switch (fTriggerParameter){
00167         case kAmplitude:
00168                 retVal=pulse.GetAmplitude();
00169                 break;
00170         case kTime:
00171                 retVal=pulse.GetTime();
00172                 break;
00173         case kIntegral:
00174                 retVal=pulse.GetIntegral();
00175                 break;
00176         case kTPILength:
00177                 retVal=pulse.GetTPILength();
00178     break;
00179     case kEnergy:
00180     retVal=pulse.GetEnergy();
00181     break;
00182     case kPedestal:
00183     retVal=pulse.GetPedestal();
00184     break;
00185     case kTriggerTime:
00186     retVal=pulse.GetTriggerTime();
00187                 break;
00188         }
00189         return retVal;
00190 }
00191 
00192 bool PulseViewer::ValuePassesTrigger(const double& value){
00193         bool retVal=false;
00194   switch (fTriggerType){
00195           case kE:
00196                   retVal=(value==fTriggerValue);
00197                   break;
00198           case kG:
00199                   retVal=(value>fTriggerValue);
00200                   break;
00201           case kL:
00202                   retVal=(value<fTriggerValue);
00203                   break;
00204           case kGE:
00205                   retVal=(value>=fTriggerValue);
00206                   break;
00207           case kLE:
00208                   retVal=(value<=fTriggerValue);
00209                   break;
00210   }
00211   return retVal;
00212 }
00213 
00214 int PulseViewer::ConsiderDrawing(const TAnalysedPulseID& id, const TAnalysedPulse* pulse){
00215   // Check pulse passes trigger condition
00216   double value=GetParameterValue(*pulse);
00217   if(!ValuePassesTrigger(value)) return 0;
00218   if(Debug()){
00219     cout << fParameterString << " = " << value 
00220          << " which is " << fTypeString << " " << fTriggerValue << endl; 
00221   }
00222   
00223   // If it does, ask ExportPulse to draw it
00224   // We're safe to assume Instance will return becuase we test it's
00225   // existence in BeforeFirstEntry
00226   ExportPulse::Instance()->AddToExportList(pulse);
00227   fTotalPlotted++;
00228   fPulsesPlotted[EventNavigator::Instance().EntryNo()].insert(id);
00229   return 0;
00230 }
00231 
00232 int PulseViewer::AfterLastEntry(TGlobalData* gData, const TSetupData* setup){
00233 
00234   // Print extra info if we're requested to summarize the found pulses
00235   if(SummarisePlots()){
00236       const std::string prefix="     ";
00237       cout<<"Summary for pulse criteria: ("<<fTriggerCondition <<") on channel "<<fSource<<endl;
00238       if(!fPulsesPlotted.empty()){
00239           cout<<prefix<<" Event | Pulses drawn "<<endl;
00240           cout<<prefix<<" ----- | ------------ "<<endl;
00241           for(EventPulseIDList_t::const_iterator i_event=fPulsesPlotted.begin();
00242                   i_event!=fPulsesPlotted.end();i_event++){
00243               cout<<prefix<<std::setw(6)<< i_event->first<<" | ";
00244               for(PulseIDList_t::const_iterator i_pulse=i_event->second.begin();
00245                       i_pulse!=i_event->second.end();i_pulse++){
00246                   cout<<std::setw(2)<< *i_pulse<<", ";
00247               }
00248               cout<<endl;
00249           }
00250           cout<<prefix<<" ----- | ------------ "<<endl;
00251       }
00252       cout<<prefix<<"Total pulses plotted = "<<fTotalPlotted<<endl;
00253 
00254   }
00255 
00256   return 0;
00257 }
